Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • Board

  •  class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to define important board characteristics. The main Game object has one instance of this class representing the main game board.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Piece[][] board 
      static int BOARD_LENGTH 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Piece getPiece(int x, int y)
      Returns the Piece object at the grid square represented by x,y
      void loadBoard()
      Loads the game from data/savegame.txt The file must exist and be valid.
      void saveBoard()
      Saves the game to data/savegame.txt
      void TakeOver(int srcx, int srcy, int destx, int desty) 
      void Update(int x, int y, Piece piece)
      This function updates the board with a newly moved piece, and replaces the pieces old position with null It is important that this function is called after every single move.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece(int x,
             int y)
        Returns the Piece object at the grid square represented by x,y
        Parameters:
        x - the x value of the grid to get
        y - the y value of the grid to get

      • Update

        public void Update(int x,
          int y,
          Piece piece)
        This function updates the board with a newly moved piece, and replaces the pieces old position with null It is important that this function is called after every single move.
        Parameters:
        x - the x value of the grid to assign
        y - the y value of the grid to assign
        piece - the Piece object to assign to the grid at x, y

      • TakeOver

        public void TakeOver(int srcx,

            int desty)

      • saveBoard

        public void saveBoard()
        Saves the game to data/savegame.txt

      • loadBoard

        public void loadBoard()
        Loads the game from data/savegame.txt The file must exist and be valid.
